resources.string:
About FoundYou
--------------
FoundYou: A Parent Controlling App
Version: 1.0.2

Purpose:
FoundYou helps parents track and monitor their child\'s safety by providing real-time location updates and parental controls.

Developer:
Developed by [Your Name/Company Name].
Contact: support@foundyou.com

Privacy:
Your privacy is important to us. For detailed information on how we handle your data, please read our Privacy Policy.

Terms:
By using this app, you agree to our Terms and Conditions.

Acknowledgments:
Built using Google Maps and Fused Location API.
